name: Screen Steroids
short_description:
[Written in AutoIt3]
This program will automatically move your mouse from one edge of the screen to the opposite side if you are holding SHIFT.

How to Use

1. Open Screen Steroids.exe
2. Read and close the pop up box (it's a how-to box)
3. If you move your mouse to any edge(s) of your screen while holding SHIFT, your mouse will appear on the other side.


>Download the .exe for just the application
>Download the .au3 for just the AutoIt3 source code
>Download the .rar or .zip for both .exe and .au3

Check out more at RandomDuck.NET
summary: Moves your mouse from one side of the screen to another!
